sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' export default class View extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state= { user:{} } } //Mounting for RESTAPI_Calls componentDidMount() { axios .get(`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users/${this.props.match.params.idno}`) .then( (result)=>this.setState({ user:result.data }) ) } render() { //URL_Router_paramter_data var {idno}=this.props.match.params return (

VIEW DETAILS {idno}

ID {user.id}
NAME {user.name}
USERNAME {user.username}
EMAIL {user.email}
PHONE {user.phone}
WEBSITE {user.phone}
) } }
